title: Start Up IT Firm With Loads Of Innovations
text: Questions Business Summary A start up IT business that has lots of Innovative ideas that has lots of market potential. Also opportunity exists to patent few process and business models that can lead to royalty income.You can hire me to do all the business purchase, and acquire my large talent, skills, work and material for a small price of my annual expenses. I can help you in the knowledge transfer and also diversify in other areas on profitable business. I can share all my learning in my MBA and Engineering degrees for you to acquire several other business in and around Toronto like Greenhouse farming, real estate, export/import. Approximate pricing is CAD 50,000 and is negotiable based on the actual service you would like to buy. For further details please call me on my mobile: +1-647 739 3921 or leave an email message. I look forward hearing from prospective buyers and long term investment partner who can profit from my assets and knowledge for mutual benefits. Thank you for your time. Regards,
